DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this prospective study is to investigate the prevalence of coronary artery disease using computed tomography with family history of premature coronary heart disease
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Coronary Artery Disease in the Siblings of Premature Coronary Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: within 1 year the siblings of premature coronary heart disease (male<55years old, female<65yeasrs old: Framingham Heart Study) patients admitted relevant hospital Documented coronary heart disease experienced adverse events with relevant treatment contraindicated with betablockers Any woman of childbearing potential who is pregnant, seeking to become pregnant or suspects
